text: Before the headache sets in... who are you?

You awaken to rude morning light. Your head is pounding. The room is destroyedâ€”furniture smashed, curtains torn. A white chicken pecks aimlessly at a spilled potion on the rug. You have no memory of last night.
You rummage through your ruined clothes. You find a crumpled piece of paper.
It's a receipt from 'Dude Fiero's Kitchen'. Scrawled on the back is the word: 'OBLIVION'.
The hotel room is a disaster scene.
You open the closet. A Drow baby wearing a spider-themed pacifier stares up at you. It gurgles.
You open the bathroom door. A massive Owlbear is drinking from the bathtub! It turns to you and roars.
The beast sniffs your hand and purrs like a giant, feathered kitten. You notice a collar on it labeled 'MacGuffin'.
The Owlbear does not appreciate your shushing. It swipes at you!
The beast lies defeated. You find a leather collar on it labeled 'MacGuffin'.
The bright sun of Sigil hurts your eyes. You recall you were heading to 'Drowtown' for the party.
A massive bouncer blocks the gate. 'Private party. Password?'
You enter Mik Tystone's mansion. He stands by a fountain. 'You stole my tiger! And my chicken!'
The bouncer's eyes go wide. 'That's Mik's kid! Get in here!' You are ushered into the VIP lounge.
You return the baby/chicken/tiger. Tystone laughs and offers you a drink. 'Hair of the dog?' The nightmare starts all over again.
